messages.message: Hi. I urgently need more credits adding to an account. Aware it’s a holiday in the US today. Is there anyone that can help please?
Is this UAT or Prod? And is it an external account?
Prod. It’s an account SE’s share when running workshops. So I guess internal?
Hm, for prod unfortunately I think we need @mfichman’s help to load credits. @Hari any idea if anyone else can help here?
Yeah! We need Matt to help here

@Matt Weaver and I caught up. We setup a test account in UAT for sharing - `<mailto:instabase.test.aihub@gmail.com|instabase.test.aihub@gmail.com>`. We'll use the fake credit card to load credits there
challenge is 2FA is enforced on uat
One issue we're facing is that this account forces 2FA, which is painful for shared account usecases. Let us know if you're aware of any way that an admin can override 2FA for a particular account
Thanks all for looking into this. During the workshop I was able to make sure we stayed within the available credits.
This being so urgent was my fault as I mis calculated how many i’d need to run the workshop. But going forwards we do need a solution where we can get credits added quickly even if people are out.

Agreed. It sounds like there are a few things here. Are the below accurate?
1. You want to be able to create shared test accounts for workshops that don't enforce 2fa
2. You want to be able to load credits for an arbitrary prod account
